home.start_your_journey_title: Start Your Journey to Success Today!
home.start_your_journey_description: Choose a plan and begin learning instantly.

hero.master-the-dutch: Master the Dutch Driving Theory Test with AI-Powered Personalized Learning
hero.master-the-dutch-description: Revolutionize your preparation with 24/7 AI assistance and personalized learning experiences. Grasp every concept thoroughly and pass on your first try.

platform.feature_1_description: Specialized in dutch traffic rules and regulations. available anytime to answer questions and explain content in detail.
platform.feature_2_description: Animated videos for each chapter. interactive quizzes following each lesson.
platform.feature_3_description: Generates new playlists based on your results. focuses on areas that need improvement.
platform.feature_4_description: Specialized in dutch traffic rules and regulations. available anytime to answer questions and explain content in detail.
platform.feature_5_description: 7 tests with 65 questions each. simulates the actual driving theory exam experience.
platform.feature_6_description: Click-to-answer style quizzes. ensures engagement and comprehension.
platform.feature_7_description: Detailed analysis provided after completing practice exams. helps you understand mistakes and learn from them.
platform.feature_8_description: Covers important topics like road signs and key numbers. ideal for quick revision.

pricing.pricing_title: Choose Your Plan and Start Learning Today
pricing.pricing_subtitle: All plans include full access to our AI-powered learning platform—select the duration that suits your study needs.

step_1.title: Sign Up
step_1.description: Create your account in just a few clicks.

step_2.title: First Choose Your Plan
step_2.description: Select the access duration that fits your needs.

step_3.title: Start Learning
step_3.description: Dive into our interactive courses and practice exams.

step_4.title: Ace the Test
step_4.description: Pass your theory test with confidence!

testimonials.title: Hear from Our Successful Students
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands who have aced their theory test with our platform.
testimonials.ready_to_be_our_next_success_story: Ready to be our next success story?

testimonial_1.name: Sophie van Dijk
testimonial_1.review: The AI Tutor was a game-changer for me! It helped me understand complex topics easily.

testimonial_2.name: Mark Jansen
testimonial_2.review: The practice exams were just like the real thing. I felt fully prepared on test day.

testimonial_3.name: Lisa de Boer
testimonial_3.review: Adaptive learning playlists made studying so efficient. I knew exactly what to focus on.

faq_1.question: How does the AI Tutor assist me?
faq_1.answer: The AI Tutor provides personalized learning experiences, adapting to your progress to maximize your understanding of key concepts.

faq_2.question: Can I access the platform on mobile devices?
faq_2.answer: Yes, our platform is fully responsive and can be accessed on both desktop and mobile devices.

faq_3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_3.answer: We accept various payment methods including Visa, MasterCard, and PayPal to ensure a secure and convenient checkout process.

faq_4.question: Is there a free trial available?
faq_4.answer: Yes, we offer a free trial to help you evaluate the platform before committing to a subscription.

faq_5.question: How does the adaptive learning feature work?
faq_5.answer: Our adaptive learning feature identifies your weak areas and tailors lessons to improve your performance efficiently.

faq_6.question: How does the AI Tutor assist me?
faq_6.answer: The AI Tutor provides personalized learning experiences, adapting to your progress to maximize your understanding of key concepts.
